title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements
description: Holiday release focused on fixing bugs and improving stability including core agent, layout controls, and code diff viewing. Added four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) with keyboard shortcuts.

community_feedback.quote: pausing UI changes and working to minimize UI changes going forward
bugs and ever-changing UI irk developers

title: Wave 13: Merry Shipmas
description: First-class support for parallel, multi-agent sessions with Git worktrees, side-by-side Cascade panes, dedicated terminal profile, and SWE-1.5 Free model available for 3 months.

community_feedback.quote: burning through Windsurf credits way too fast
tried them all but Sonnet is still the model I'm most productive with

title: Gemini 3 Flash
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available for all users, combining Pro-grade reasoning with Flash-level speed. Achieves 78% on SWE-bench Verified benchmark.

community_feedback.quote: Google's Gemini 3 just changed everything and nobody saw this coming

title: Agent Skills Support
description: GitHub Copilot now supports Agent Skills, allowing users to teach Copilot how to perform specialized tasks in a specific, repeatable way.

community_feedback.quote: Improved speed and reduced context consumption

title: C++ Code Editing Tools in Public Preview
description: C++ code editing tools for GitHub Copilot entered public preview in Visual Studio 2026 Insiders release.

title: Gemini 3 Flash Model
description: Gemini 3 Flash is now available across Visual Studio, JetBrains IDEs, Xcode, and Eclipse for Copilot users.
